contest-event.event-date:
June 16, 1928 D Hardraw Scar
Hardraw Scar 0 Entertainments Contest Hardraw Scar hardraw-scar
Test Piece Contest
The Mastersingers (Die Meistersinger)
Green Dragon Inn, Hardraw, North Yorkshire Prizes - 1st £50 and cup, 2nd £30, 3rd £10. March contest - 1st Carlton Main £1.10s., 2nd Brighouse 15s., 3rd Black Dyke. Brass Band News July 1928 shows George Hawkins adjudicating. 5 bands competed.
Dec. 20, 2013, 5:57 p.m. March 18, 2021, 10:35 p.m.
1 Brighouse and Rastrick Band Fred Berry
2 Black Dyke Band William Halliwell
3 BHK (UK) Horden Band Joseph Crawford Dyson
Unknown Result Carlton Main Frickley Colliery Band Unknown
Unknown Result Sowerby Bridge Subscription Unknown
